Priority. Reduce foe's Strength.

If successful, for the next 4 Rounds the User and Allies will receive 1 less damage from Physical Attacks. This effect does not stack. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
Priority 4. Shield. If the foe attacked using a Physical Move. it is now Poisoned. Reduce 3 Dice from the Foe's Damage Pool.
Ranged. Successive Actions. -1 Accuracy.
Increase the User's Defense by 2.

The User returns to this Pokéball. Any Increased Trait on the User is passed on to the next Pokémon. That Pokémon is ready to fight on the next Round. The User can't Increase those Traits again for the rest of the scene. Switcher Move.
Ranged. Charge Move. Low Priority 3. If the User is hit by a Non Ranged Physical Attack while this move is charging. Apply Burn 2 to the foe.
If the attack is successful. add 2 Dice of Damage for every ally Pokémon that spends an action to help the user perform this move. up to 3 allies may join.
If the Foe is under the effects of Dynamax, This Move becomes Lethal and you add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.
If the Foe is under the effects of Dynamax, This Move becomes Lethal and you add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Paralize the foe. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.
